Title: oSoft ColorPicker Control for Visual Studio 2010
Description: oSoft ColorPicker is an user control that can be used instead of the ColorDialog when you want to allow your users to select a color in a windows form. It is developed in C# 2010 and works for any Visual Studio 2010 release.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
oSoft ColorPicker is an user control that can be used instead of the ColorDialog when you want to allow your users to select a color in a windows form. It is developed in C# 2010 and works for any Visual Studio 2010 release.
